title: Forza Motorsport 7: Ultimate Edition – v1.174.4791.2 + All DLCs + Multiplayer
body:
Forza Motorsport 7: Ultimate Edition – v1.174.4791.2 + All DLCs + Multiplayer


Genres/Tags: Racing, Simulation, First-person, Third-person, Cars, 3D
Companies: Turn 10 Studios, Microsoft Studios
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI17
This game works only on Windows 10 v1909+ and Windows 11
Original Size: 99.2 GB
Repack Size: 66.8/67.7 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: ZippyShare
  • Filehoster: BayFiles
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on UWP release v1.174.4791.2: 99.2 GB, thanks to 0xdeadc0de for files!
  • UWP crack/fixer applied over, thanks to 0xdeadc0de!
  • 160 DLCs are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless, but NOT MD5 Perfect: game data packs have been rebuilt to make installation 8-10 times faster at cost of slightly larger final installed size and incompatibility with any delta-patches, which are unlikely to appear ever again
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of 4K videos
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 99.2 to 66.8/67.7 GB)
  • Installation takes 30-90 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 106.6 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • After installation, first run the crack installer from desktop icon. After that you can use an actual game desktop icon to run the game
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • Run “Forza Motorsport 7 (Install Crack)” shortcut as admin first, then press enter when following the given sequence of actions to install the app through CMD: (3 -> 1 -> 4 -> 5)
  • After completing the above CMD sequence, run the game from the start menu; use a fake abox account to log in and play the game
  • If experiencing login issues when launching the game, then install/re-install the following services: Microsoft Store, Xbox, Xbox Gaming Services.

Game Description

Experience the thrill of motorsport at the limit with the most comprehensive, beautiful and authentic racing game ever made.

Forza Motorsport 7 is where Racers, Drifters, Drag Racers, Tuners, and Creators come together in a community devoted to everything automotive. Drive the cars of your dreams, with more than 700 amazing vehicles to choose from including the largest collection of Ferraris, Porsches, and Lamborghinis ever. Challenge yourself across 30 famous destinations and 200 Tracks, where race conditions change every time you return to the Track. Experience it all in gorgeous 60fps and native 4K resolution in HDR!

Game Features

  • Improved Drift, Drag, & Time Attack
  • New modes: Tag, Virus & Pass the IT
  • Improved Lighting, Graphics & Shadows
  • Drift Steering Angle Upgrade and Scoring
  • New Race Shop
  • Upgraded Multiplayer
  • Improved Force Feedback
  • New Multiplayer Meetups
  • New Track Limits
